item.title: Early Hawaiian petroglyphs on a beach are visible again with changing tides
item.description: Early Hawaiian petroglyphs have resurfaced on a beach in Waianae, Hawaii

item.title: Flash flooding prompts rescues in New Mexico mountain village
item.description: Another afternoon of heavy rainfall has prompted flash flooding in the southern New Mexico mountain village of Ruidoso
